extension.summary: GenieTv Kodi's largest support tool. [CR] Brought to you by the Architects@Work
extension.description: GenieTv The Ultimate Kodi Utility, This All In One Addon Has Been Created To Service All Kodi Needs And Hopefully In The Future, To Brings Devs And Streamers Alike A Platform And Home To host Their Content.
extension.disclaimer: The author neither hosts or stores any content, the author has no affiliation with content hosts
